message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that we believe will greatly enhance your experience. For this exceptional offering, I am proposing a price of $150. I hope you find this fair and look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $120?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to negotiate. However, given the quality and craftsmanship of our product, I believe a fair price would be $140. I hope this offer aligns better with your expectations while still reflecting the true value of our product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $130. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our expectations.
